description: Pompom is a peppy, duck villager who has appeared in every Animal Crossing series game. Her name is derived from "pom-pom," a ball of fibers wielded by cheerleaders during sports, alongside her initial phrase "rah rah" - "rah rah" is a popular cheerleading chant. Many peppy villagers aspire to become cheerleaders, so it is likely her name and initial phrase make direct relation to the peppy personality.
